post.text: We have a President and somebody running against me that doesn't even want to use the term RADICAL ISLAMIC TERRORISM. If they can't name it, they can't fix it! It is time to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AGAIN!

comment.author: Catherine
comment.text: You,Donald J.Trump shall lose the American Presidential Election coming November 2016!

replies.author: Alek
replies.text: Catherine go and see Hillary's America out in theatre now!
